messages.title: I AM READY
messages.content: I am from Glasgow and have lived here for many years. It is a privilege to be your Brexit Party Parliamentary Candidate at the General Election. I am not a career politician. I have worked as a fitness instructor for many years. Our broken political system has failed to deliver the Brexit that 52 percent of us voted for. Like many, I have lost trust in politics. As your MP I would build homes on brownfield sites to help solve the housing crisis. Whether fighting for Brexit and democracy, or standing up for local people, I will be a strong voice for Glasgow North.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I am pledged to abolish inheritance tax.
I will invest £200 billion into neglected regions to create well-paid, highly skilled jobs.
I am dedicated to breaking free from the EU Customs Union.
I will defend our fishing industry.
I will tackle homelessness with affordable housing.

issues.brexitEurope: We Must Control Our Laws, Borders, Money and Defence.
issues.defence: We Must Control Our Laws, Borders, Money and Defence.
issues.economy: Invest £200bn in our neglected regions creating well paid, highly skilled jobs.
issues.governance: Let’s Make Parliament Serve The People.
issues.health: Keep Investing, Better Management, Less Waste.
issues.immigration: We Need A Fair, Firm Points-based System.
issues.labourEmployment: Creating well paid, highly skilled jobs.
issues.transport: Spend £100bn On Transport And Jobs In The Regions.

community.content: As your MP I would build homes on brownfield sites to help solve the housing crisis.
